title: A Visit from St Nicholas: a Coronet fantasy
creator_credit: David A. Smart and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Animated adaptation of “Twas the night before Christmas” by Clement Clarke Moore executed in a simple limited animation style including 3-D objects and cut-out animation techniques.
